arch_conf.name: Description
arch_conf.value: RISC-V is an instruction set architecture (ISA) based on the RISC type and its hardware is free. This architecture was created in 2010 at the University of California, Berkeley.

instructions.name: div
mret
instructions.definition: PC = MEPC; MIP = MIP & -2057; MCAUSE = 0; capi_drawstack_end();currentExecutionMode = ExecutionMode.User;

instructions.name: fclass.d
instructions.definition:
let a = capi_float2bin(rs1);
rd=capi_check_ieee(parseInt(a[0]), parseInt(a.slice(1,12), 2), parseInt(a.slice(13), 2));

instructions.name: fclass.s
instructions.definition:
let a = capi_float2bin(rs1);
rd=capi_check_ieee(parseInt(a[0]), parseInt(a.slice(1,9), 2), parseInt(a.slice(10), 2));

instructions.name: fdiv.d
fdiv.s
fld
fsd
fsgnjx.d
instructions.definition:
let a = rs1<0; let b = rs2<0;
rd = (a^b) ? -Math.abs(rs1) : Math.abs(rs1);

instructions.name: fsgnjx.s
instructions.definition:
let a = rs1<0; let b = rs2<0;
rd = (a^b) ? -Math.abs(rs1) : Math.abs(rs1);

instructions.name: fsqrt.d
fsqrt.s
fsw
instructions.definition:
var val1 = capi_float322uint(rs1);
 capi_mem_write(rs2+inm, val1, 'w', rs1_name);

instructions.name: jal
lbu
lhu
lw
instructions.definition:
var addr = capi_int2uint(rs1)+inm;
 rd = capi_mem_read(addr, 'w', rd_name);

instructions.name: csrrw
instructions.help: Swaps the values of the CSR and the integer register.

pseudoinstructions.name: bltz
pseudoinstructions.help: Conditional branch if Rsrc1 is less than zero.

pseudoinstructions.name: la
li

interrupts.interruptCheck: let MIP = crex_findReg('MIP'); if (MIP.match) { let value = readRegister(MIP.indexComp, MIP.indexElem); if (value & 2**11) InterruptType.External; else if (value & 2**3) InterruptType.Software; else null; } else null;
interrupts.enableCheck: let MSTATUS = crex_findReg('MSTATUS'); if (MSTATUS.match) !!(readRegister(MSTATUS.indexComp, MSTATUS.indexElem) & 2**3); else false;
interrupts.interruptEnable: let MSTATUS = crex_findReg('MSTATUS'); if (MSTATUS.match) readRegister(MSTATUS.indexComp, MSTATUS.indexElem) | 2**3;
interrupts.getHandlerAddr: let MTVEC = crex_findReg('MTVEC'); if (MTVEC.match) readRegister(MTVEC.indexComp, MTVEC.indexElem) >> 2
interrupts.clearInterrupt: let MIP = crex_findReg('MIP'); if (MIP.match) writeRegister(readRegister(MIP.indexComp, MIP.indexElem) & ~(2**11 + 2**3), MIP.indexComp, MIP.indexElem)
interrupts.setInterruptCause: (interrupt_type) => let MCAUSE = crex_findReg('MCAUSE'); if (MCAUSE.match) { let val; switch (interrupt_type) { case 'InterruptType.Software': val = 2**3; break; case 'InterruptType.External': val = 2**31 + 2**11; break; case 'InterruptType.EnvironmentCall': val = 2**8; break; } writeRegister(val, MCAUSE.indexComp, MSTATUS.indexElem); }
